setup_cmd: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y gcc-arm-none-eabi libnewlib-arm-none-eabi
build_cmd: cmake -G 'Unix Makefiles' -B build -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=build/cmake/toolchain/arm-none-eabi-gcc.cmake -DVENDOR_STM32=ON -DTARGET_CORTEX_M0=ON -DTARGET_CPU_FAMILY=STM32F051x8 -DENABLE_LTO=ON -DENABLE_SMALL=ON -DBUILD_LIB=ON -DBUILD_TESTS=ON -DTEST_GENERIC=OFF -DTEST_SLEEP=ON && cmake --build build --config Release --parallel 4

build_cmd: cmake -G 'Unix Makefiles' -B build -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=build/cmake/toolchain/arm-none-eabi-gcc.cmake -DVENDOR_STM32=ON -DTARGET_CORTEX_M3=ON -DTARGET_CPU_FAMILY=STM32F103xB -DENABLE_LTO=ON -DENABLE_SMALL=ON -DBUILD_LIB=ON -DBUILD_TESTS=ON -DTEST_GENERIC=OFF -DTEST_SLEEP=ON && cmake --build build --config Release --parallel 4
